overview: Executive Vice President of Marketing and COO Vijay Dube brings over 20 years of strategic experience to Wavesat. Mr. Dube was previously VP Marketing and Business Development for Atsana Corp., an Ottawa-based fabless semiconductor company. Prior to that, he co-founded Dipix Technologies where he was VP of Sales & Marketing. He also worked as Chief of Operations for a business unit at Coreco Imaging, driving strategic product and business development. Mr. Dube has extensive experience in marketing, sales, business development and product management in wireless, semiconductors and digital imaging. Previously a co-founder of two companies of his own, Mr. Dube holds a B.Sc. in Systems Design Engineering from the University of Waterloo.

relationships.title: Executive Vice President of Marketing and COO
